coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: Small engraved lettering informs you that these sticks were made by 'Norin'.
coreAttributes.name: dragonfly bobby pin
coreAttributes.description: A pair of bobby pins in the shape of a dragonfly.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] a pair of dragonfly bobby pins out from [npc.her] [npc.hairSkin+], letting it flow free.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] a pair of dragonfly bobby pins out from [npc2.NamePos] [npc2.hairSkin+], letting it flow free.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(rip)] a pair of dragonfly bobby pins out from [npc2.NamePos] [npc2.hairSkin+].

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(gather)] [npc.her] [npc.hairSkin+] and [npc.verb(slide)] in a pair of dragonfly bobby pins.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(gather)] [npc2.NamePos] [npc2.hairSkin+] and [npc.verb(slide)] in a pair of dragonfly bobby pins.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(gather)] [npc2.NamePos] [npc2.hairSkin+] and [npc.verb(force)] in a pair of dragonfly bobby pins.
